import React from 'react' import { urlIconCreator } from '../services/services' import { UilArrowUp, UilArrowDown } from "@iconscout/react-unicons" const Forcast = ({weather: {title, list, icon}}) => { return (

title

{list.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{`${item.temp}`}°

{`${item.min_temp}`}

|

{`${item.max_temp}`}
))}
) } export default Forcast
